outputFile.comment: The path to save the generated image
hardwareurl.comment: The url that provides current compass mining hardware prices for featured, reseller, and at home ASICs
useTor.comment: Indicates whether remote calls should use torify for privacy. Experimental
colorTextFG.comment: The color of the text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorBackground.comment: The background color of the image expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorTextWarn.comment: The color of the text if there are warnings or errors accessing the hardwareurl
colorEntryLabel.comment: The color of the group/category label expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorEntryName.comment: The color of the miner name expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorEntryPrice.comment: The color of the price expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
colorEntryPower.comment: The color of the power info text expressed as a Hexadecimal color specifier
sizeEntryLabel.comment: The font size to use for the group/category label
sizeEntryName.comment: The font size to use for the miner name
sizeEntryInfo.comment: The font size to use for the informational labels
width.comment: The width, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 480
height.comment: The height, in pixels to generate the image. Default is 320
sleepInterval.comment: The amount of time, in seconds, the script should wait before data gathering and image creation again
